Container.Name: DockerTemplateManager
Container.Overview:
Docker Template Manager v1.4.0 - Professional Docker template management system for Unraid with modern web interface.
🎯 **Core Capabilities:** • 📊 **Dashboard & Analytics** - Visual statistics with pie charts and real-time data • 🔍 **Template Management** - Smart search, sortable tables, hybrid editor (form + XML) • 🐳 **Container Management** - Direct container controls, bulk operations, sortable lists • 💾 **Backup & Restore** - One-click backups with automatic naming and restore functionality • 🎨 **Professional UI** - *arr-style navigation, theme toggle, mobile responsive
✨ **Key Features:** • **Sortable Tables** - Click column headers to sort by name, size, date, status • **Hybrid Template Editor** - Form-based editing with XML toggle for advanced users • **Bulk Operations** - Select multiple templates/containers for batch actions • **Smart Template Matching** - Auto-detect which templates are in use • **Container Controls** - Start, stop, restart containers directly from the interface • **Real-time Search** - Find templates and containers instantly • **Professional Styling** - Consistent UI with hover effects and visual indicators
🔒 **Security Features:** • API key authentication (required) • Path traversal protection • Input validation and sanitization • CORS protection • All dependencies updated to latest secure versions
⚡ **Quick Installation:** 1. **Install** - Use default settings (they're correct!) 2. **API Key** - Leave empty to auto-generate, or set custom key 3. **Start Container** - Check Docker logs for API key if auto-generated 4. **Access WebUI** - Enter API key when prompted 5. **Done!** - Start managing your Docker templates professionally
🎯 **Perfect for:** • Cleaning up unused Docker templates • Managing container configurations • Creating template backups • Organizing your Docker ecosystem • Professional template editing
**Version 1.4.0** - Latest with sortable tables, hybrid editor, and bulk operations!
